docs.lead_paragraph: The House of Representatives ended the bill’s 14-year limbo over objections from the Catholic Church, which opposes provisions for sex education for schoolchildren and subsidized contraceptives.

headline.seo: Philippines Bill Would Improve Contraceptive Access
headline.main: Philippines Moves Forward With Bill to Improve Contraceptive Access
headline.print_headline: Philippines: Lawmakers Act On Reproductive Health Bill

docs.abstract: Philippine lawmakers move ahead on bill that would mandate sex education in schools and subsidize contraceptives, despite opposition from the powerful Roman Catholic Church.
docs.snippet: The House of Representatives ended the bill’s 14-year limbo over objections from the Catholic Church, which opposes provisions for sex education for schoolchildren and subsidized contraceptives.

docs.lead_paragraph: Even before she was pregnant, Yolanda Marin-Czachor tried to avoid the full-body X-ray scanners that security officers use to screen airport passengers. Now she's adamant about it: She'll take a radiation-free pat-down instead any day.''I had two miscarriages before this pregnancy ,'' Ms. Marin-Czachor, a 34-year-old mother and teacher from Green Bay, Wis., recalled, ''and one of the first things my doctor said was: 'Do not go through one of those machines. There have not been any long-term studies. I would prefer you stay away from it.' ''

headline.main: X-Ray Scans at Airports Leave Lingering Worries

docs.abstract: Questions persist about the safety of the 244 full-body 'backscatter' X-ray scanners in use at 36 airports in the United States, where security regulations have prevented many scientists from evaluating the machines directly; some scientists have criticized the Transportation Security Administration for failing to inspect the machines often enough. (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: We decided to open our daughter’s adoption by hiring a searcher to find the birth mother; we did it because we were told that she loved our daughter very much.

headline.seo: Untying a Birth Mother’s Hands - Modern Love

docs.abstract: Elizabeth Foy Larsen Modern Love column describes the fallout, both joyful and painful, from the decision to accompany to travel with their adopted daughter back to Guatemala to meet her birth mother.
docs.snippet: We decided to open our daughter’s adoption by hiring a searcher to find the birth mother; we did it because we were told that she loved our daughter very much.

headline.main: Why the Backlash on Bloomberg's Breastfeeding Initiative?

docs.abstract: Why the rash of outrage at a policy meant to promote breastfeeding? Fear that its implementation may be as bad as the formula promotion it's meant to change.
docs.snippet: Why the rash of outrage at a policy meant to promote breastfeeding? Fear that its implementation may be as bad as the formula promotion it's meant to change.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Wednesday temporarily prohibited Arizona from enforcing its new ban on most abortions starting at 20 weeks of pregnancy.
docs.abstract: Federal appeals court temporarily prohibits Arizona from enforcing its recently enacted ban on most abortions starting at 20 weeks after pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: At a time when abortion rights and access to affordable contraception are threatened by political attacks, three federal judges failed to preserve constitutional protections for women.
